moves.1. c4: Hi everybody, just to continue my theme of making blunders under pressure this time it is my buddy dmaestro who is on the receiving end.  A lot of the time dmaestro has caused me many problems and I have suffered from serious passivitis against him so I am glad to give something back here!  I kick off with c4 which is the English Opening.
moves.3... d6 4. d4 Nbd7 5. e4: 5. e4 - becoming a bit like a Philidor Hanham Variation.
moves.8. Re1 Re8 9. Bf1 Bf8: 9. ........ Bf8 - both sides undevelop their kingside bishops.
moves.10. Rb1 a5 11. b3 g6 12. a3 Qc7 13. Bb2: 13. Bb2 - protecting my c3 knight should there be an exchange of pawns on d5.
moves.13... Nh5 14. d5 f5 15. Nd2: 15. Nd2 - the knight retreats to add protection to  the e4 pawn.  Dmaestro, however chooses to advance his f pawn - he is trying for the standard kingside pawn attack where he is trying to keep my pieces confined to the queenside.
moves.15... f4 16. Be2 Ng7 17. Bg4 Nf6 18. Bxc: 19. Rc1 - after an exchange of bishops I decide to put my rook on the same file as the Wicked Witch of the West.  Never a bad plan to do this unless the Witch is threatening mate on the move!
moves.19... c5 20. f3 g5 21. Nb5: 21. Nb5 - my knight makes use of an outpost on b5.
moves.21... Qf7 22. Nf1 h5 23. Bc3: 23. Bc3 - the start of a plan to open up the queenside.
moves.23... b6 24. Bd2 Qg6 25. b4 axb4 26. axb: 26. axb4 - the a file is open.
moves.26... g4 27. bxc5: 27. bxc5 - as the f3 pawn is adequately defended I continue to give my pieces some air on the queenside with the possibility of winning either the d pawn or the b pawn depending which pawn takes on c5.
moves.27... bxc5 28. Ra1: 28. Ra1 - first my rook takes command of the open a file.
moves.28... gxf3 29. Qxf3: 29. Qxf3 - Glenda must recapture as the g pawn is pinned - she also comes closer to Henry.
moves.29... h4 30. Ra6: 30. Ra6 - puts pressure on the d6 pawn.
moves.30... Nfh5 31. Ba5: 31. Ba5 - reinforcements on the queenside - I have Bc7 in mind, piling up on the d6 pawn.   I also plan to put my other rook on a1 to add fuel to the fire.   Dmaestro succumbs under this pressure by waving the white flag!
